title: Strengthening Web Development Practical Competencies: Situated Interaction-Based Problem-Framing Skill Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can apply three or more problem-framing strategies in given scientific contexts
Learners can generate problem structures by connecting distributed situational resources (data, tools, context) in a simulation environment
Learners can propose two or more alternative framings to resolve contradictions in problems through collaboration with peers
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
